Package io.anserini.ltr

Class TwitterFeatureExtractor

java.lang.Object
io.anserini.ltr.BaseFeatureExtractor<java.lang.Integer>
io.anserini.ltr.TwitterFeatureExtractor
public class TwitterFeatureExtractor
extends BaseFeatureExtractor<java.lang.Integer>
Feature extractor for the twitter collections. Does not require performing searches
